Articles.Content: Was wondering if any of the awesome mod makers out there would consider making a recovery ship mod from when the manned capsules make water splashdowns like the Apollo program had. If not an animated one with the rescue helicopter mayme a place able static carrier for us to aim for during re-entry.

Get Better Buoyancy by Ferram and make your own. I don't think anyone has ever done cutscenes or anything of the sort, if that's what you are looking for.

There are a few mods that add structures and other buildings around Kerbin. I remember a derivative that added a sea launch-platform.

Here is the main rep.
Try the Boat Parts mod, see if it still works in 0.90, and build your own boat if it works.
